item.description:
The ice was just redone - cool as a jewel. So come on and get some ice time!
Time change too! 7-8:50PM

Night Skate With DJ $7 per person $3 for skate rental
Then out for a tucker to Outback ? (West Springfield)

From CT & South & North
Route 91 North to Springfield
Exit 3 to Route 5 to Route 57 (Going over CT river)
Route 57 to Southwick Center
Right on to 202 & 10 to Westfield
At second set of lights. turn right onto West Silver Street
At next set of lights, turn right onto South Broad (Post office on corner)
Entrance 2nd & 3rd Driveway on right

From North
Route 91 South to Mass Pike Route 90
Take exit 3 Westfield
Right on to 202 & 10 to Westfield
Stay on 202 & 10 to the center of Westfield (City Common Green)
Continue straight onto Broad Street (passing Fire Station on left)
Go to the lights down by Big Y & Post office, continue
Straight on South Broad Street
Entrance 2nd & 3rd Driveway on right
item.how_to_find_us: I'll find you, enough of the people know my face and can point me out.
item.why: It's fun (when you are on your skates at least)
item.name: Ice Skating- ** Summer Hours ** 7-8:50PM
